full_summary:
### Title
Truck Scale and Display Unit Kiosks CFB Halifax
### Contract Number
PW-_HAL-418-11560
### Brief Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites suppliers to submit a bid for the supply and installation of a truck scale and display unit kiosk at CFB Halifax Dockyard, and a display unit kiosk replacement at 12 Wing Shearwater.

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W0100-222377/A, dated 2021/12/21, with a closing date of 2022/02/15 at 14:00 AST.

**Important Note**: All tender submissions will be made electronically using epost Connect.

**Selection Criteria**: The bidder with the lowest-priced proposal will be awarded the contract.

**Tender Requirements**:

* Delivery of a truck scale and display unit kiosk at CFB Halifax Dockyard
* Replacement of a display unit kiosk at 12 Wing Shearwater
* Installation of all equipment
* Compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
* Adherence to all specified technical and functional requirements

**Additional Notes**:

* This tender is subject to Canada's Trade Agreement listed below.
* Bidders are required to submit their interest in the tender within 5 calendar days prior to the closing date.
* The contract may be negotiated with selected suppliers.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
